quest: What did a man from Saul’s camp bring to David? (10)
What did David have done to the Amalekite who claimed to have killed Saul? (13-15)
ans: Had a young man fall on him and  smite him dead

quest: What did David say about the mighty? (19,25,27)
What did the men of Judah do to David at Hebron? (4)
ans: They anointed David king over the house of Judah.

quest: Who did Abner make as king over Israel? (8-10)
How long was David king over just Judah? (11)
Who pursued after Abner and was killed by Abner? (19-23)
What eventually happened as the war between the house of Saul and the house of David continued? (1)
ans: David waxed stronger and stronger, and the house of Saul waxed weaker and weaker

quest: What did Abner decide to do regarding the kingdom of Israel? (9-12)
ans: Translate the kingdom from the house of Saul, and to set up the throne of David over Israel and over Judah

quest: What did David ask Abner to bring with him? (13)
Who killed Abner without David’s permission? (26-27)
What did Recab and Baanah do to Ishbosheth, son of Saul? (5-8)
ans: They smote him and beheaded him, and brought the head of Ishbosheth to David

quest: What did David’s men do to Recab and Baanah? (12)
ans: They slew them, cut off their hands and their feet, and hanged them up over the pool in Hebron

quest: What did the elders of Israel do to David? (3)
ans: They anointed David king over Israel

quest: How old was David when he became king of Judah? (4)
What city did David conquer and call the City of David? (7)
What did Hiram, king of Tyre, do for David? (11)
ans: Sent messengers to David, and cedar trees, and carpenters, and masons: and they built David an house

quest: Who did David defeat twice? (17-25)
What happened to Uzzah? (6-7)
ans: Because Uzzah put forth his hand to the ark of God,  God smote him and he died by the ark of God

quest: At whose house did the ark remain for three months? (11)
What did David do when he brought the ark to the City of David? (14-15)
ans: David danced before the LORD with all his might

quest: What was Michal’s reaction to David’s dancing before the Lord? (16,20)
ans: She despised him in her heart

quest: What happened to Michal? (23)
